experience.description: Working with a team to maintain and expand the Jumbo Extra's app. A project with rapid development and nearly 1.9 million active users
Collaborate with IAM specialists to mantain and expand the identity infrastructure for over 100.000 employees.
Working independently on a diverse range of IT projects. Both in developing new systems and supporting existing ones.
Worked on a new IOT-system to monitor and respond to various climate conditions within Summa College's buildings.
Helped to maintain and expand the internal information infrastructure.
